revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I am directed by the Solicitor General and Acting Attorney General to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 20th instant,—and, in compliance with your request to enclose herewith twenty five (25.) additional blank forms for statistics of crime—and to thank you for your courtesy in this matter.
